EmailTemplate.name: Reservation_Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Course {!Reservation__c.Course_Name__c} attended
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Reservation__c.Student_Name__c} ,
We would like to thank you for attending our {!Reservation__c.Course_Name__c} course.
Honeywell Aerospace Training Solutions is dedicated to serving as your premier training service provider for all your aerospace product needs.
I welcome your feedback regarding your Training Solutions experiences, and I would like to hear from you directly regarding any suggestions, comments, and ideas you have about how we can continue to improve.
Please reach out to me at Max.Butler@honeywell.com or 602-365-3521 at any time to provide your feedback. Again, any and all feedback is welcomed and very much appreciated.
We look forward to supporting you in your next training opportunity.
Best Regards,
Max Butler
Customer & Product Support
Honeywell â€“ CAE Training Alliance Team
